Abilene.Texas Tech University Health Sciences Ce:
The Texas Tech University Health Sciences Center at Abilene is a Texas Tech University Health Sciences Center campus located in Abilene, Texas. The campus has a school of pharmacy and a school of nursing,


== Pharmacy ==
The School of Pharmacy opened on August 12, 2007. Classes are held in a Spanish-themed 36,000-square-foot (3,300 m2) building, constructed at a cost of US$15.5 million.
